segments.text: I'm looking forward to our son's graduation this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . So am I . But what will he do after graduation ? He really needs to go to college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , dear , we can't force him to go to college . It's up to him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that but he has to learn to be independent . He can't just keep living at home .
segments.speaker: S2
